name: DatenKraken
description:
Genre: 2D Action Platformer

***

Play as an ever-hungry DatenKraken. Browse the web and jump from website to website. Harvest all the personal data you can find! You can only move inside advertisements, but watch out for ad-blockers! Search for cookies on the website to unlock more routes!

Conrols

You control the DatenKraken with WASD. Hold LMB to move one arm and navigate from ad to ad. Use the arm to interact with cookies.

Credits

Created by Nils Foerster, Adrian Herbers, Patrick Herbers, Christina Piete, and Patrick Quiskamp. Featuring the original music of Dragona Mortoria! She composed the dynamic music for this game! Check her out on Spotify!

Programming by: NF, PH, PQ

Design: NF, AH, PH, PQ

Art: AH, PH, CP, PQ

Sounds: DM

Music: DM

Update Notice:

We found a bug in the web version that prevented the music to by synced up correctly. With respect to the music artist; We fixed that.
